directions: Mix ingredients in a glass or small jar and add about an ounce of warm water. Drink all at once before eating in the morning.

html.directions: Mix ingredients in a glass or small jar and add about an ounce of warm water. Drink all at once before eating in the morning.
html.ingredients:
1 Tbsp Raw Apple Cider Vinegar

1 Tbsp Fresh Lemon Juice

¼ teaspoon Ginger

1 Tbsp Raw Honey

Dash Cayenne Pepper

1/4 teaspoon Turmeric

1/8 Teaspoon Cinnamon
html.notes: Based on Don't Waste The Crumbs Recipe

ingredients:
1 Tbsp Raw Apple Cider Vinegar
1 Tbsp Fresh Lemon Juice
¼ teaspoon Ginger
1 Tbsp Raw Honey
Dash Cayenne Pepper
1/4 teaspoon Turmeric
1/8 Teaspoon Cinnamon
name: Apple Cider Vinegar Shot with friends
notes: Based on Don't Waste The Crumbs Recipe
